p: QianLi Kang and YanYan Wang contributed equally to this work. RR and LR conceived and designed the experiments. QK, LG, and HJ collected the herbs and prepared the herbal extracts. YW and QC carried out the antiviral screening. RD and YY analyzed the data. QK, YW, and RD wrote the paper. RR and LR edited the paper. All authors contributed to the final version.
